  responses={{"200":{"description":"Password settings","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"response":{"required":["allowedCharactersRegexStr","digits","digitsRegexStr","minLength","specSymbols","specSymbolsRegexStr","upperCase","upperCaseRegexStr"],"type":"object","properties":{"minLength":{"type":"integer","description":"The minimum number of characters required for valid passwords.","format":"int32","example":1234},"upperCase":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether the password should contain the uppercase letters or not.","example":true},"digits":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether the password should contain the digits or not.","example":true},"specSymbols":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether the password should contain the special symbols or not.","example":true},"allowedCharactersRegexStr":{"type":"string","description":"The allowed password characters in the regex string format.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"digitsRegexStr":{"type":"string","description":"The password digits in the regex string format.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"upperCaseRegexStr":{"type":"string","description":"The password uppercase letters in the regex string format.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"specSymbolsRegexStr":{"type":"string","description":"The passaword special symbols in the regex string format.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The password settings parameters.","title":"PasswordSettingsDto"},"count":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"links":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"href":{"type":"string"},"action":{"type":"string"}}}},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"title":"PasswordSettingsWrapper"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
